title: Sessions Orders Review of DOJ Agreements with Police (Audio)
itunes:title: Sessions Orders Review of DOJ Agreements with Police (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Amy Dillard, a professor at the University Of Baltimore School of Law, discusses U.S. attorney general Jeff Sessions' decision to reevaluate the federal agreements with dozens of law enforcement agencies in a push for President Trump's law and order agenda. She speaks with Greg Stohr Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
